title: Random black screens while playing league.
body: I am currently using an ASUS ROG GL502VM and I experience random black screens while playing League. The random black screens occurs every few minute or when a major teamfight erupts. I wasn't sure if my FPS dropped hard because I never got to see it. But judging by the specs of this laptop, that shouldn't be an issue with the specifications. Has anybody experienced this problem ?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are your [graphics drivers up to date](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq2)?
Do you experience this while playing any other graphically intense game?
Does your laptop feel very hot when this occurs?

No, my laptop feels fine most of the time. I have not tried playing other graphically intense games because I don't have the time. Yes, my graphic drivers are up to date . Still can't find out the reasoning to this.
